author: vmassol
msg: According to the XML definitions (at least the
version...> tag should go before the <?xml-stylesheet
...> tag. Using them in the wrong order produces an
error when Mozilla tries to render it. Patch by Felipe Hoffa [felipehoffa@yahoo.com]
